data.name: Privacy Statement
data.value: 私隱聲明

data.name: entirely on your computer
data.value: 完全喺你嘅電腦上

data.name: AnduinOS itself does not collect, transmit, or store any user data.
data.value: AnduinOS 本身不會收集、傳輸或儲存任何用戶數據。

data.name: Last updated: May 10, 2025
data.value: 最後更新：2025年5月10日

data.name: Introduction
data.value: 簡介

data.name: AnduinOS is a free and open-source Linux distribution based on Ubuntu.
data.value: AnduinOS 係一個基於 Ubuntu 嘅免費同開源 Linux 發行版。

data.name: 2. Why Local Execution Matters
data.value: 2. 本地執行嘅重要性

data.name: , without requiring communication with any external servers owned by us or third parties.
data.value: ，無需與我哋或第三方擁有嘅任何外部伺服器進行通訊。

data.name: This document explains how AnduinOS handles user data, clarifies its technical design regarding privacy, and outlines considerations related to upstream components.
data.value: 本文件解釋 AnduinOS 如何處理用戶數據，闡明其關於私隱的技術設計，並概述與上游組件相關的考慮因素。

data.name: This ensures:
data.value: 這確保：

data.name: AnduinOS does not include any telemetry, analytics, advertising, tracking, or behavior profiling mechanisms.
data.value: AnduinOS 不包含任何遙測、分析、廣告、追蹤或行為分析機制。

data.name: Local execution means that all features and services of AnduinOS are performed
data.value: 本地執行意味著AnduinOS的所有功能與服務均於

data.name: We are committed to protecting your privacy.
data.value: 我們致力於保護您的私隱。

data.name: Thus, AnduinOS is fundamentally privacy-preserving by design.
data.value: 因此，AnduinOS 從設計根本上就係以保護私隱為原則。

data.name: 1. Data Collection by AnduinOS
data.value: 1. AnduinOS 嘅數據收集

data.name: There are no hidden background processes or network communications initiated by the system for the purpose of gathering user information.
data.value: 系統不會為收集用戶資訊而啟動任何隱藏背景程序或網絡通訊。

data.name: Transparency:
data.value: 透明度：

data.name: You retain complete control over your personal data.
data.value: 你完全保留對個人資料嘅控制權。

data.name: Control:
data.value: 控制：

data.name: Security:
data.value: 安全性：

data.name: No data leaves your machine without your explicit action.
data.value: 未經你明確操作，數據不會離開你的電腦。

data.name: In a world where remote telemetry has become ubiquitous, AnduinOS deliberately minimizes external dependencies to protect users.
data.value: 喺遙距遙測技術無處不在嘅世界入面，AnduinOS 刻意減少外部依賴以保護用戶。

data.name: AnduinOS is distributed under the
data.value: AnduinOS 係根據以下條款發佈嘅

data.name: This license guarantees:
data.value: 此許可證保證：

data.name: Reducing external communications limits exposure to interception or exploitation risks.
data.value: 減少外部通訊可降低被攔截或利用嘅風險。

data.name: GNU General Public License v3.0 (GPL-v3)
data.value: GNU通用公共授權第三版 (GPL-v3)

data.name: Freedom to modify:
data.value: 修改自由：

data.name: Freedom to inspect:
data.value: 查閱自由：

data.name: You can review the source code to verify there are no hidden tracking mechanisms.
data.value: 你可以查閱源代碼以確認當中沒有隱藏的追蹤機制。

data.name: You can adjust the code to suit your needs, including removing any components you distrust.
data.value: 你可以調整代碼以符合你嘅需要，包括移除任何你唔信任嘅組件。

data.name: The open nature of AnduinOS empowers users to independently verify that the system respects their privacy.
data.value: AnduinOS 嘅開放性質讓用戶能夠獨立驗證系統係尊重佢哋嘅私隱。

data.name: You can share AnduinOS, either modified or unmodified, under the same license terms.
data.value: 你可以喺相同嘅授權條款下分享 AnduinOS，無論係修改過定係未修改嘅版本。

data.name: 4. Upstream Software and Privacy Considerations
data.value: 4. 上游軟件與私隱考量

data.name: There are no proprietary blobs or closed modules outside of upstream dependencies explicitly inherited from Ubuntu.
data.value: 除咗明確繼承自Ubuntu嘅上游依賴之外，並冇任何專有二進制模組或封閉模組。

data.name: it integrates a wide range of upstream open-source software
data.value: 它整合咗廣泛嘅上游開源軟件

data.name: (Some examples and references can be found
data.value: （部分示例及參考資料可於

data.name: here
data.value: 此處

data.name: Notably:
data.value: 值得注意的是：

data.name: While AnduinOS itself does not collect any data,
data.value: 雖然 AnduinOS 本身不會收集任何數據，

data.name: We strongly recommend users review Canonical's
data.value: 我們強烈建議用戶查閱 Canonical 嘅

data.name: for details.
data.value: 詳情。

data.name: originating from Ubuntu, Debian, GNOME, Flathub, and other sources.
data.value: 源自 Ubuntu、Debian、GNOME、Flathub 及其他來源。

data.name: 3. Open Source Guarantees Your Freedom
data.value: 3. 開源保障你嘅自由

data.name: Freedom to redistribute:
data.value: 自由再分發：

data.name: Some upstream components may have independent data collection mechanisms.
data.value: 部分上游組件可能設有獨立嘅數據收集機制。

data.name: (Ubuntu's developer) may collect certain system information for statistics and diagnostics purposes via tools like:
data.value: （Ubuntu嘅開發商）可能會透過以下工具收集特定系統資訊作統計同診斷用途：

data.name: Snap store background services (if Snap is manually installed by users)
data.value: Snap 商店背景服務（如用戶手動安裝 Snap）

data.name: Privacy Policy
data.value: 私隱政策

data.name: not
data.value: 不

data.name: AnduinOS does
data.value: AnduinOS 並唔會

data.name: modify, enhance, or introduce additional telemetry into these upstream components.
data.value: 修改、增強或向這些上游組件引入額外的遙測功能。

data.name: AnduinOS does not preinstall any telemetry-related packages
data.value: AnduinOS 並無預裝任何與遙測相關嘅套件

data.name: such as:
data.value: 例如：

data.name: Snap daemon
data.value: Snap 守護進程

data.name: Canonical Livepatch service
data.value: Canonical Livepatch 服務

data.name: AnduinOS does not participate in any system reporting, usage statistics submission, or automated crash reporting
data.value: AnduinOS 不會參與任何系統報告、使用統計提交或自動崩潰報告。

data.name: It merely redistributes them in their original, unmodified state.
data.value: 它僅以原始未修改的狀態重新分發它們。

data.name: 5. How to Handle Potential Ubuntu Telemetry
data.value: 5. 如何處理潛在的Ubuntu遙測數據

data.name: To ensure full opt-out, you can review and, if necessary, remove these packages using:
data.value: 為確保完全退出，你可以檢視並在必要時使用以下指令移除這些套件：

data.name: Thus, by default,
data.value: 因此，預設情況下，

data.name: Explanation:
data.value: 說明：

data.name: popularity-contest
data.value: 受歡迎程度調查

data.name: : Periodically submits anonymous package usage statistics.
data.value: 定期提交匿名套件使用統計數據。

data.name: AnduinOS is committed to keeping your installation clean and telemetry-free by default.
data.value: AnduinOS 承諾預設保持您的安裝純淨且無遙測功能。

data.name: However, if you manually install packages from Ubuntu repositories or enable certain Ubuntu-specific features, some of these telemetry mechanisms may be introduced.
data.value: 不過，如果你手動安裝來自 Ubuntu 軟件庫嘅套件，或者啟用某啲 Ubuntu 專有功能，就可能會引入呢啲遙測機制。

data.name: If these packages are not installed (as is the case with a clean AnduinOS installation), no action is required.
data.value: 若呢啲套件冇安裝到（例如全新安裝嘅 AnduinOS 就係咁），就唔使做任何嘢。

data.name: maintained in spare time by volunteers.
data.value: 由志願者於空餘時間維護。

data.name: Note:
data.value: 注意：

data.name: 6. Responsibility Clarification
data.value: 6. 責任聲明

data.name: and does not share any information with governments, corporations, or any third parties.
data.value: 並且不會與政府、企業或任何第三方分享任何資訊。

data.name: AnduinOS is a community-driven, non-profit project
data.value: AnduinOS 係一個由社群推動、非牟利嘅項目。

data.name: : Automated error reporting services.
data.value: 自動錯誤報告服務。

data.name: 7. Contact Information
data.value: 7. 聯絡資料

data.name: please refer to their respective upstream privacy policies.
data.value: 請參考相關上游服務嘅私隱政策。

data.name: For privacy concerns related to third-party applications,
data.value: 就第三方應用程式相關嘅私隱問題，

data.name: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Statement or AnduinOS's privacy practices, please contact:
data.value: 如對本私隱聲明或 AnduinOS 的私隱慣例有任何疑問，請聯絡：

data.name: Email:
data.value: 電郵：

data.name: : Collects basic hardware and software details at installation time.
data.value: 於安裝時收集基本硬件及軟件資料。

data.name: Community:
data.value: 社群：

data.name: AnduinOS does not have a data collection infrastructure
data.value: AnduinOS 並無數據收集基礎設施

data.name: AnduinOS GitHub Discussions
data.value: AnduinOS GitHub 討論區

data.name: All system operations, configurations, and user activities take place locally on your own device (\"local execution\").
data.value: 所有系統操作、配置及用戶活動均於您嘅裝置上本地進行（「本地執行」）。

data.name: All system operations, configurations, and user activities take place locally on your own device ("local execution").
data.value: 所有系統操作、配置及用戶活動均於您嘅裝置上本地執行（"local execution"）。
